attributes.additional_details:
Is total control of everything you do , think and say what you want?
What are you; a masochist?
The Leveson Enquiry wants to ban Free Speech.
Are you so dim that you cannot see that?
Voting for Leveson is like trusting in Politicians.
Futile. They want to stop the media finding out about their unlawfullness and their scandals.
If you want a sterilised and useless press and have a brain like a sheep then i am obviously wasting my time.
